summary:
The Russian Premier League (RPL) is the country's top professional soccer league. It was founded in 2001 and rebranded in 2018. The league consists of 16 teams, with the top two qualifying for the UEFA Champions League and the next two for the UEFA Conference League (currently suspended due to political reasons). The bottom two teams are relegated, and the 13th and 14th placed teams play in a playoff.

Zenit St. Petersburg is the current and consecutive champion (2018-2023), with 10 titles overall. Other winners include CSKA Moscow (6 times), Lokomotiv Moscow (3), Rubin Kazan (2), and Spartak Moscow (1).
title: Russian Premier League
